ygData.subject: Lower Guk (was Hunting in rathe Mtns (was need some serious help))
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Until my faction with FrogloksofGuk bottoms out, I will never get tired of The Ruins of Old Guk. Frrroooaaakkk!
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: jhenders@...
>
> Only problem with that is, you're going to be awfully tired of lower guk
> by your mid-late 40's. Personally, I'd put off going there until
> everywhere else you can possibly hunt is green. At mid-high 30's I think
> the king room in perma is still quite blue. I'm not sure when the exp
> tapers off in the king and other deep areas in Sol A, but I'd check
> there. Both of these places require good parties before you go though.
>

Until my faction with FrogloksofGuk bottoms out, I will never get
tired of The Ruins of Old Guk.

Frrroooaaakkk!
